name: Yellow Beard
description:
Hello. My name is Yellow Beard.

I can only jump and run.

The earth was torn to pieces. Only a few chunks are still floating around here. I have no idea if there are more survivors or if there is still solid land. But I have to go on a search.

Please help me!

 

Controls

Move: "a" and "d" or left/right arrow

Jump: "w", up arrow or space

Currently game has no sounds. Comming soon...
